price: 15. Waxay odhan lahaayeen: Waxaa uun la awday Indhahayaga. Mayee, waxaanu nahay qolo la sixray.
arabic: لَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتۡ أَبۡصَٰرُنَا بَلۡ نَحۡنُ قَوۡمٞ مَّسۡحُورُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: laqālū innamā sukkirat abṣārunā bal naḥnu qawmun masḥūrūna
